character.background: Erik Thorn, born in the mystical Forest of Elders, is an exceptional elf who has been showcasing extraordinary skills in archery since a young age. Despite his youthful appearance, Erik is well over a century old. He has lived through numerous battles, proving his courage and strength in each one. His parents were renowned warriors, but were unfortunately killed during the Dragon War. Since then, Erik has been living on his own, making a name for himself as a master archer.
